title: Build dataframe of edges of recursive dependencies — build_recursive_edges
text: package_name Name pattern. Character vector, length 1 fun Name function. Character vector, length 1 pattern_ignore NULL character vector regex patterns. present, recursive_deps ignore functions match pattern(s) character vector. Can take multiple patterns. pattern_dont_recurse NULL character vector regex patterns. present, recursive_deps list functions match pattern(s), recurse functions.. Can take multiple patterns.

title: Build dataframe of edges of recursive dependencies — build_recursive_edges
Build dataframe of edges of recursive dependencies — build_recursive_edges
code: build_recursive_edges("purrr", "map") #>                   from                            to #> 1                  map                          map_ #> 2                 map_                     as_mapper #> 3                 map_                   as_progress #> 4                 map_             call_with_cleanup #> 5                 map_                         mmap_ #> 6                 map_           running_in_parallel #> 7                 map_              vctrs_vec_compat #> 8                 map_           with_indexed_errors #> 9          as_progress               stop_input_type #> 10               mmap_                 simplify_impl #> 11               mmap_  with_parallel_indexed_errors #> 12 running_in_parallel       parallel_pkgs_installed #> 13     stop_input_type             obj_type_friendly #> 14     stop_input_type                  oxford_comma #> 15   obj_type_friendly       .rlang_as_friendly_type #> 16   obj_type_friendly .rlang_stop_unexpected_typeof #> 17   obj_type_friendly             vec_type_friendly

what: List the functions in a package that depend on a function — find_function_dependencies
title: List the functions in a package that depend on a function — find_function_dependencies
text: Returns character vector functions package package_name depend function fun.

title: List the functions in a package that depend on a function — find_function_dependencies
List the functions in a package that depend on a function — find_function_dependencies
text: package_name package name character string fun function name character string include package functions returned ("package "), functions except base R operators ("operators"), functions ("")?

title: List the functions in a package that depend on a function — find_function_dependencies
List the functions in a package that depend on a function — find_function_dependencies
code: find_function_dependencies("codeInspectr", "find_recursive_dependencies") #> [1] "find_function_dependencies" "package_functions"          body(codeInspectr::find_recursive_dependencies) #> { #>     funs <- package_functions(package_name) #>     if (!fun %in% funs) { #>         cli::cli_abort("Function {.fn {fun}} is not a function in package {.pkg {package_name}}") #>     } #>     seen <- character(0) #>     dep_vec <- character(0) #>     stack <- fun #>     while (length(stack) > 0) { #>         cur_fun <- stack[1] #>         stack <- stack[-1] #>         seen <- c(seen, cur_fun) #>         new_deps <- find_function_dependencies(package_name,  #>             cur_fun) #>         if (!is.null(pattern_ignore)) { #>             multi_grep <- function(x) { #>                 grep(x, new_deps, value = TRUE) #>             } #>             ignore_ls <- purrr::map(pattern_ignore, multi_grep) #>             ignore_vec <- unique(do.call(c, ignore_ls)) #>             new_deps <- setdiff(new_deps, ignore_vec) #>         } #>         dep_vec <- unique(c(dep_vec, new_deps)) #>         if (!is.null(pattern_dont_recurse)) { #>             multi_grep <- function(x) { #>                 grep(x, new_deps, value = TRUE) #>             } #>             dont_recurse_ls <- purrr::map(pattern_dont_recurse,  #>                 multi_grep) #>             dont_recurse_vec <- unique(do.call(c, dont_recurse_ls)) #>             new_deps <- setdiff(new_deps, dont_recurse_vec) #>         } #>         stack <- unique(c(stack, new_deps)) #>         stack <- setdiff(stack, seen) #>     } #>     return(setdiff(dep_vec, fun)) #> }

what: Identify all functions that are called by the specified function, and all functions called by them, etc — find_recursive_dependencies
title: Identify all functions that are called by the specified function, and all functions called by them, etc — find_recursive_dependencies
text: Recursively walk downwards function calls. Two options reduce traversal functions may interest (e.g., "validate_.*" functions): pattern_ignore completely ignore functions matching
